title: A note on "Goals, constraints, and transparently fair assignments: A field study of randomization design in the UEFA Champions League''. (arXiv:2210.15555v2 [physics.soc-ph] UPDATED)
description: A paper published on 2 September 2022 in Management Science (Boczo\'n, M. and Wilson, A. J.: Goals, constraints, and transparently fair assignments: A field study of randomization design in the UEFA Champions League) contains substantial omissions and inaccuracies. This note attempts to correct them.
dc:creator: László Csató
